para.verbatim:
Check that a libsecp256k1 shared library exports only expected symbols.
Usage examples: - When building with Autotools: ./tools/symbol-check.py .libs/libsecp256k1.so ./tools/symbol-check.py .libs/libsecp256k1-<V>.dll ./tools/symbol-check.py .libs/libsecp256k1.dylib
- When building with CMake: ./tools/symbol-check.py build/lib/libsecp256k1.so ./tools/symbol-check.py build/bin/libsecp256k1-<V>.dll ./tools/symbol-check.py build/lib/libsecp256k1.dylib
